directions.step:
Preheat oven to 350 deg F. Place the bananas, peeled and halved lengthwise, in pan. Spread bananas evenly with the other ingredients. Bake 15 - 20 min until juice and honey are melted, and bananas are browned.
This was very good. If I make it again I would double the sauce as there is not really much for each serving as it is.
